meanings.definition: One that exceeds or surpasses others in a particular quality or attribute.
meanings.sent1: In the race, Sarah proved to be the exceeder by finishing first.
meanings.sent2: The student who scored the highest in the class is considered the exceeder.
meanings.sent3: At the talent show, the exceeder of all was the young magician with amazing tricks.
meanings.sent4: Among the stars in the sky, the brightest one shone like an exceeder in the night.
meanings.sent5: The champion swimmer was an exceeder in speed, leaving all competitors behind.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that goes beyond a certain limit or boundary.
meanings.sent1: The marathon runner was an exceeder, completing the race in record time.
meanings.sent2: The balloon, rising higher than expected, became an exceeder of expectations.
meanings.sent3: The cake, towering with layers, was an exceeder in both taste and appearance.
meanings.sent4: The river, overflowing its banks, acted as an exceeder of its usual boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The kite, soaring above the trees, was an exceeder in height among all others.
